content: Hi @Don Sizemore - I saw you opened this stream. Do you think we should switch it from being "web public" to a more private flavor? Given the potentially sensible topics, maybe it would even be a good thing to not allow anyone to join / share history?
Hello, sir. The idea was to point any security reports to existing channels, but you're welcome to make this stream private if you like.
Hmm, maybe we could talk it out more here: https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/375876-zulip/topic/private.20channel.20for.20security.3F
